alert.note: Alert for Dallas (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 21 at 7:39PM CDT until July 21 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR AUTAUGA...ELMORE...SOUTHERN PERRY...DALLAS AND SOUTH CENTRAL TALLAPOOSA COUNTIES... At 739 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Still Waters Resort to Emerald Mountain to near Paul M Grist State Park to Central Mills, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Prattville, Selma, Millbrook, Wetumpka, Tallassee, Valley Grande, Selmont-West Selmont, Elmore, Coosada, Deatsville, Eclectic, Autaugaville, Orrville, Billingsley, Martin Dam, Bogue Chitto, Santuck, Tyler, Autauga County Airport and Dannelly Reservoir. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
